casebody.data:
In the Matter of PARK FABRICS CORPORATION, Bankrupt. Sidney J. Wollman, Appellant, Albert J. Pfeiffer, Trustee in Bankruptcy of Park Fabrics Corporation, Appellee. No. 197. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 30, 1936. Max E. Sanders, of New York City, for appellant Sidney J. Wollman. Zalkin & Cohen, of New York City (Israel Akselrod, of New York City, of counsel), for trustee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
